title: How can we help?
desc: Get in touch with developer for product questions.

user.desc: Speak to developer about pricing, product features, or request a discount.

team.title: Team support
team.desc: Seeking guidance on team collaboration functions or other business development.

influencer.title: Influencer support
influencer.desc: Promote or distribute IF to get volume discounts and activation codes.

reddit.desc: Submit your thoughts and suggestions on IF and share your best practices.

plan.title: Sponsor Future Plan
